title: SecOps Portfolio
aboutText: I specialize in security operations, monitoring, and vulnerability management. My focus is on securing cloud environments, performing penetration testing, and implementing best security practices across systems.
contactText: Contact me for security audits, penetration testing, or consultancy.

portfolio.title: Vulnerability Assessment
portfolio.description: Performed comprehensive vulnerability scans and risk assessment on cloud environments.

portfolio.title: Security Monitoring
portfolio.description: Implemented SIEM and alerting pipelines to monitor critical systems.
